[Flame Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=1805)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 375 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** An effect would deal fire damage to you or an ally within range

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** one creature that would take fire damage from the triggering effect
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You swiftly deflect incoming flames. The target gains fire resistance 15 against the triggering effect.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Flame Barrier
